title: Name Changes
body: Hello, im an NA player under the name of Clyder and I was hoping to change my name to Clyde so when I go into profile and check to see when was the last time that the previous owner had played, it seems they havent even played a game in 2 years. Though when I go to change my name it says the names unavalible, what do I do?

replies.body: We don't have specifics to offer for when a name would become available through the [summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).  You'll have to keep trying through the store whenever you believe the protection might be off.  We don't manually assist with this, because we want all players to have an equal chance towards getting a reserved name.  Sorry about that, but good luck!
